structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COMMISSION AND CITY MANAGER FORMS OF GOVERNMENT (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 15, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 5, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235dd-35, 3235dd-35a, 3480c-36, 3606c-20.
